Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off LaMarr Hoyt (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1985, off Luis DeLeon (SD)...
Injured on 7/24/1987 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1987...
Injured on 6/13/1988 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
9/22/1988: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $1,900,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1988...
Injured on 3/15/1989 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis to Seattle on 5/26/1989 (Going to STL: P Russ Springer, C Rich Gedman. Going to SEA: C Mike Lavalliere, SS Ozzie Smith)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1989...
